com.github.triceo.splitlog

Interface LogWatch

  • All Superinterfaces:
    MessageDeliveryNotificationSource

    public interface LogWatch
extends MessageDeliveryNotificationSource
    The primary point of interaction with this tool. Allows users to start listening to changes in log files. Use LogWatchBuilder to get an instance.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Follower follow()
      Begin watching for new messages from this point in time.
      org.apache.commons.lang3.tuple.Pair<Follower,Message> follow(MessageDeliveryCondition waitFor)
      Begin watching for new messages from this point in time, immediately calling CommonFollower.waitFor(com.github.triceo.splitlog.conditions.MessageDeliveryCondition) - this way, no messages can be missed between the actual start of the tailer and the first wait.
      org.apache.commons.lang3.tuple.Pair<Follower,Message> follow(MessageDeliveryCondition waitFor, long howLong, TimeUnit unit)
      Begin watching for new messages from this point in time, immediately calling CommonFollower.waitFor(com.github.triceo.splitlog.conditions.MessageDeliveryCondition, long, TimeUnit) - this way, no messages can be missed between the actual start of the tailer and the first wait.
      File getWatchedFile()
      The file that is being tracked by this class.
      boolean isFollowedBy(Follower follower)
      Whether or not unfollow(Follower) has been called for a given follower.
      boolean isTerminated()
      Whether or not terminate() has been called.
      boolean terminate()
      Stop all followers from following and free resources.
      boolean unfollow(Follower follower)
      Stop particular follower from following.

    • Method Detail

      • isTerminated

        boolean isTerminated()
        Whether or not terminate() has been called.
        Returns:
        True if it has.

      • getWatchedFile

        File getWatchedFile()
        The file that is being tracked by this class.
        Returns:
        Never null

      • isFollowedBy

        boolean isFollowedBy(Follower follower)
        Whether or not unfollow(Follower) has been called for a given follower.
        Parameters:
        follower - Tailer in question.
        Returns:
        True if it has.

      • follow

        Follower follow()
        Begin watching for new messages from this point in time.
        Returns:
        API for watching for messages.

      • follow

        org.apache.commons.lang3.tuple.Pair<Follower,Message> follow(MessageDeliveryCondition waitFor)
        Begin watching for new messages from this point in time, immediately calling CommonFollower.waitFor(com.github.triceo.splitlog.conditions.MessageDeliveryCondition) - this way, no messages can be missed between the actual start of the tailer and the first wait. .
        Parameters:
        waitFor - Condition to pass to the follower.
        Returns:
        The new follower and the result of the wait call.

      • follow

        org.apache.commons.lang3.tuple.Pair<Follower,Message> follow(MessageDeliveryCondition waitFor,
                                                           long howLong,
                                                           TimeUnit unit)
        Begin watching for new messages from this point in time, immediately calling CommonFollower.waitFor(com.github.triceo.splitlog.conditions.MessageDeliveryCondition, long, TimeUnit) - this way, no messages can be missed between the actual start of the tailer and the first wait. .
        Parameters:
        waitFor - Condition to pass to the follower.
        howLong - How long to wait for the condition to be met.
        unit - The time unit for the above.
        Returns:
        The new follower and the result of the wait call.

      • terminate

        boolean terminate()
        Stop all followers from following and free resources.
        Returns:
        True if terminated as a result, false if already terminated.

      • unfollow

        boolean unfollow(Follower follower)
        Stop particular follower from following.
        Parameters:
        follower - This follower will receive no more messages.
        Returns:
        True if terminated as a result, false if already terminated.
